Body: Description: Eduard , we have tried to Trigger that Policy by using internal OMF excel large file of data  and it triggers the policy but  there is no key word related to CAN SIN in that excel file .  I am attaching the Log files from Manny computer .  Can you please check

What We've Learned Updated: the policy was triggered on a file that did not contain any of the words from the dictionary used in contextual detection.
however, when removing SIN from the dictionary, it did not trigger anymore so I think there is a tag or header with sin in a word.
Next Steps Updated: monitoring for a couple of days and closing the case
